properties.name: closeOnNavigation
properties.description: Defines whether the drawer should be closed when navigation start is detected. Defaults to true.
properties.rawdescription: Defines whether the drawer should be closed when navigation start is detected. Defaults to true.

properties.name: disableClickOutside
properties.description: Defines whether it should be possible to click outside of the drawer to close the drawer.
properties.rawdescription: Defines whether it should be possible to click outside of the drawer to close the drawer.

properties.name: host
properties.description: A host element the drawer will be appended to.
properties.rawdescription: A host element the drawer will be appended to.

properties.name: initialState
properties.description: Data to pass to component inside drawer.
properties.rawdescription: Data to pass to component inside drawer.
